value:
Although I dislike war, were I to
refuse, I would be put to death.
I was left no choice...

Macedon has bowed to Dolhr, and
now we face the worse end of the
bargain.

Aah! Even the approaching steps of
warhorses are frightening. The very
sensation of dread itself...

I don't wish for this to get out but...
Prince Marth of Altea is truly kind.
If I must serve, I'd serve Altea.

My younger sister refused the
prince's marriage proposal. I suppose
she was nervous or something...$k$pWe must find her a suitable match.

A fine castle. Someday I may request
entry to escape battle. Please,
do not tell $Nf!

Oh! Have I improved?! Well, I
suppose I am a soldier of
Macedon, after all.

I must find my resolve. If I am to die,
I want to do so with some dignity
and grace.

Lena...my sister. Forgive your
fool of a brother...

Your expectations are troubling...
Please just promise not to put me
on the front lines.

My sister ran off, I was ordered
to war... My family may very well
end with this generation.

Here, $Nu!$k$pSorry to be so loud, but I have been
thinking.$k$pWhat if this place, I mean this world,
is the other side? There is no doubt
that I would have died in that battle.$k$pA hodgepodge group of guys dragged
into battle clearly has no chance of
defeating Prince Marth's army...$k$pLena...my sister. Forgive your foolish
brother. I will pray for your happiness
from the comfort of this castle.$k$pMy sister is capable, but plenty of
scoundrels wish to exploit her heart
and steal her affection. Protect her...
I've got what it takes!
For my sister...
I can fight if I must.
I will protect her!
Forgive your foolish brother...
I'm Matthis. It's nice to meet you.
Huh... Lena?! Ah, it was only you.
My greatest wish is to see my sister again before I die.
I won't just hand over my sister to a thief like Julian!
I never wanted to fight. I was pressed into joining the rebel army.
Lena, where could you be?
Let us work together and search for my dear Lena!
Oh, I see.
Hmm...
I'll do it!
